Field "testCases": Test case 2: Expected output should be in stdout format, not data structure format

originalDocument.title: Athlete Rankings
originalDocument.content:
You are given an integer array score of length n, where score[i] represents the score of the i-th athlete in a competition. All scores are unique.

Athletes are ranked based on their scores:

The highest score gets 1st place,

The second highest gets 2nd place, and so on.

The ranking titles are assigned as follows:

1st place → "Gold Medal"

2nd place → "Silver Medal"

3rd place → "Bronze Medal"

From 4th place onward → the placement number as a string (e.g., "4", "5", etc.)

Your task is to return an array answer of size n, where answer[i] represents the rank (as a string) of the i-th athlete.
constraints: All the values in score are unique.
originalDocument.inputFormat:
```
A single line of space-separated integers representing the scores of athletes.

```
originalDocument.outputFormat: An array of strings, where each string represents the rank or medal title for the corresponding athlete.
